alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 11:50PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Roseau, northern Beltrami and Lake of the Woods Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Hayes Lake State Park to Carmel. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baudette, Williams, Roosevelt, Norris Camp, Swift, Thorhult and Zippel Bay State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau
